Injury: Acquired from the Vegas Golden Knights.
Selected by the Vegas Golden Knights from the Chicago Blackhawks in the NHL Expansion Draft.
Signed by the Chicago Blackhawks to a two-year contract extension.
Missed the last 2 playoff games (right wrist injury).
Missed the last 64 regular season and first 13 playoff games (leg injury).
Assigned to the Rockford IceHogs (AHL) for conditioning purposes.
Signed as an undrafted free agent by the Chicago Blackhawks to a two-year entry-level contract.
